results.abstract: Mississippi is one of 10 states, all with Republican-led legislatures, that continue to reject federal funding to expand health insurance for the poor, intensifying financial pressure on hospitals.
des_facet: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)

media.caption: Greenwood Leflore Hospital in Mississippi lost $17 million last year, as rural hospitals nationwide struggle to deal with population declines, soaring labor costs, and a long-term shift toward outpatient care.

results.title: Ari Aster Has Something Funny to Show You. Don’t Be Scared.
results.abstract: The maker of “Midsommar” may be known for horror, but he thought that film was comical. With his latest movie, “Beau Is Afraid,” the dark humor is more apparent.

media.caption: Ari Aster initially intended “Beau Is Afraid” to be his first film. Instead he spent time during the pandemic lockdown honing the script into an uncompromising follow-up to “Midsommar.”
media.copyright: Victor Llorente for The New York Times

results.title: Wright Brothers’ Airplane Factory Is Badly Damaged in Fire
